text: Ambalappuzha railway station (Code: AMBL) is a railway station in Alappuzha District, Kerala and falls under the Thiruvananthapuram railway division of the Southern Railway Zone, Indian Railways.The station is a major station on the Ernakulam-Kayamkulam coastal railway line. It is an NSG 2 category station. The station is operated by the Southern Railway zone of the Indian Railways and comes under the Thiruvananthapuram railway division. == Layout == Alappuzha railway station has 3 platforms to handle long distance and passenger trains.
